title: Bauhaus: Living Art headings
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172048im_/http:/img853.imageshack.us/img853/1773/hgmh.jpg)

It's the title and heading typeface throughout the 2009 book Bauhaus: Living Art.

Notice the round a and the situational usage of serifs.

Font: 

 ITC Stone Informal Semibold 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172048/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: johndjameson

comments.content: **[ITC Stone Informal (Semibold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172048/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Stone%20Informal%20Semibold%20-%20Regular&fid=cf3bcba4b41bb5105540c326f310ea08&fsize=36&text=The%20Private%20Lives%20of%20the%20Bauhaus%20Masters&wrap=2)** by Sumner Stone (1987) available from ITC, Adobe, Linotype
